com.compsci408.rxcore.datatypes

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compsci408.rxcore.datatypes.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Prescription, Schedule

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class of all medication alert events. Includes all pertinent information about these events, including the id of the recipient patient and id of the provider who assigned it, the dosage, and the date. Does not include specific time of event.
    Author:
    Evan

      • toFormattedString

        public abstract java.lang.String toFormattedString(boolean showName,
                                                   java.lang.String dateFormat)
        Format the Event's details into a string for display to the user
        Parameters:
        showName - True if the medication's name should be shown, False otherwise
        dateFormat - Format in which date should be displayed, e.g. 'YYYY-MM-dd'
        Returns:

      • formatDate

        public static java.lang.String formatDate(java.lang.String input,
                                          java.lang.String outFormat)
        Given a date string as input and a desired format for that date, reformat the date string and return it
        Parameters:
        input - Original date string
        outFormat - String representation format of desired date string
        Returns:
        Reformatted date string
